translations: adj.分解脂肪的；[生化] 脂解的

phrs.translation: 解脂的, 脂解的, 分解脂肪的, 脂肪分解的
脂肪分解酶, 解脂酶, 解脂酵素
脂解激素, 脂肪溶解激素
解脂性酸数, 脂肪分解性酸败
脂解系数, 解脂系数英语, 翻译

sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, lipolytic metabolism in subcutaneous adipose tissue and gastrocnemius was also increased.
sentences.translation: 另一方面，肌肉组织和皮下脂肪组织的脂肪分解也增强。

sentences.sentence: Together, these findings reveal how cancer cells can co-opt a lipolytic enzyme to translate their lipogenic state into an array of protumorigenic signals.
sentences.translation: 总之，这些结果显示癌细胞如何能通过脂肪分解酶转化脂肪形成一系列具有促癌信号的状态。
